# Class IntentMatcher

Class for intent matching functionality. Provides methods to detect intents in user input text using multiple strategies:

  * Strict matching (exact phrase matching)
  * Embedding-based semantic matching
  * LLM-based classification



##### Index

### Methods

destroy isInitialized matchIntents

## Methods

### destroy

  * destroy(): void

Cleans up resources associated with this intent matcher. Should be called when the matcher is no longer needed to prevent memory leaks.

#### Returns void




### isInitialized

  * isInitialized(): boolean

Checks if the intent matcher is properly initialized and ready for use.

#### Returns boolean

True if the matcher is initialized, false otherwise




### matchIntents

  * matchIntents(input: string): Promise<[IntentMatchInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_intent_match.IntentMatchInterface)[]>

Matches intents in the provided input text. Returns matches sorted by confidence score (highest first).

#### Parameters

    * input: string

Text to analyze for intents

#### Returns Promise<[IntentMatchInterface](/interfaces/common_vector_intent_match.IntentMatchInterface)[]>

Promise resolving to an array of intent matches

#### Throws

InworldError if intent matching fails or matcher is not initialized

  * Inherited
